Detailed Description

Control for layouting components inside a grid. A grid with a variable number of rows and columns can be specified, where each component is assigned to one cell of the grid. For each cell layouting properties can be specified. It is also possible to specify a minimum size. If this size is not available, the grid layout control automatically adds a horizontal and/or vertical position indicator, so that the content can be scrolled.
